TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FirstDayOfWeek extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates the first day of the week to use when calling date-related functions.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When you call date-related functions, you can use the following enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values.
Some date-related functions take a `DayOfWeek` argument, a `WeekOfYear` argument, or both. The `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeration specifies the valid values for the `DayOfWeek` arguments, as well as the possible return values from the functions.
The `DayOfWeek` argument takes the `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeration members.
Date-related functions also return `FirstDayOfWeek` values (except `System`).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.FirstDayOfWeek Friday = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Friday This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.FirstDayOfWeek Monday = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Monday This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.FirstDayOfWeek Saturday = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Saturday This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.FirstDayOfWeek Sunday = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Sunday (default) This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.FirstDayOfWeek System = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The first day of the week as specified in your system settings This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.FirstDayOfWeek Thursday = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Thursday This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.FirstDayOfWeek Tuesday = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Tuesday This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.FirstDayOfWeek Wednesday = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Wednesday This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant .
